content: Hi all, welcome to the Care Plan track for Connectathon 16, track description is here: http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201709_Care_Plan

I created an HSPC sandbox test server (STU-3) loaded with 3 patients that have one or two care plans each, and other associated resources. I am building these sample FHIR resources based on Veteran persona descriptions developed by VA for Meghan, Byron, and Dan. Open endpoint is https://api-stu3.hspconsortium.org/careplantest/open
Add this HSPC endpoint as the Data Server for clinFHIR and you can display really cool resource graphs (thanks @David Hay !) Meghan-careplans.png

You're welcome! That is a cool graph! I'll add the endpoint as a 'fixed' server in cf to make it a bit easier...
btw I'm not at CT this time around - - but will keep an eye on the chat in case there's anything I can do to help out...
btw - I've also got https://api3.hspconsortium.org/fhirconnect14/open/ as an hspc endpoint - do we need both?

Thanks David, you can remove the old hspc endpoint from fhirconnect14, the URL format has changed anyway so that one won't work. @Travis Cummings do you have any other HSPC endpoints that you'd like added to clinFHIR for this connectathon?
Summary slides posted to track wiki page, http://wiki.hl7.org/index.php?title=201709_Care_Plan
